original_text: and he will rule them with a rod of iron, as when earthen pots are broken in pieces, even as I myself have received authority from my Father.
korean_text: 그가 철장을 가지고 그들을 다스려 질그릇 깨뜨리는 것과 같이 하리라 나도 내 아버지께 받은 것이 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: and he will rule them with a rod of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 쇠 지팡이로 그들을 다스릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: as when earthen pots are broken in pieces
even as I myself have received authority from my Father
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 아버지께로부터 권세를 받은 것과 같이
